# ðŸ§© Project README Template

Use this template as the starting point for any new project's README.

---

```markdown
# [Project Name]

## What is this

A brief description of what this project does and who it is for.

## Status

Current status of the project (Decide / Execute / Operate / Archived).

## Discovery summary

Link to the Discovery Summary document (D1-D6) and the approved decision gate.

## Phase plans

Links to SDLC Phase Plans (E1-E6) for each execution phase.

## Getting started

Steps to set up the project locally or access the deployed version.

## Architecture

High-level overview of how the system is structured.
Link to detailed architecture documentation if available.

## Key decisions

Link to decision records or list the most important technical choices
and why they were made.

## Team

| Role | Name | Contact |
|---|---|---|
| Project lead | | |
| Technical lead | | |
| Client contact | | |

## Documentation

Links to relevant documentation:

- Architecture docs
- Operational runbooks
- API documentation

## Known limitations

List anything that is intentionally out of scope or known to be incomplete.
```
